channel.title: Classic on The Cookie Isle
channel.description: Recent content in Classic on The Cookie Isle

item.title: Chocolate Chip
item.description:
The cookie that started it all. Our classic chocolate chip cookie features a perfect balance of crispy edges and a soft, chewy center. Each cookie is generously studded with premium semi-sweet chocolate chips and finished with a sprinkle of flaky sea salt.

Baked fresh daily using real butter and pure vanilla extract.

item.title: Oatmeal Raisin
item.description:
Our Oatmeal Raisin cookie is comfort in every bite. Made with hearty rolled oats and plump, juicy raisins, this cookie strikes the perfect balance between chewy and satisfying.

A touch of warm cinnamon brings it all together, making this a timeless favorite for those who appreciate the classics.

Perfect for: Breakfast on the go or an afternoon pick-me-up with tea.
